bibl.title: Goodbye Family Gloom! The Coming of Charaxos in the Brothers Song.
The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2

bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Sailing to Naucratis. - A role for Dionysus. - How the Brothers Song began.
bibl.seg: Dirk Obbink, Goodbye Family Gloom! The Coming of Charaxos in the Brothers Song.

Anton Bierl & André Lardinois (edd.), The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2 = Mnemosyne. Supplements. 392 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 208-224.
